function.name: device_open
function.description: This function is used to open a SmartThings device to a specified percentage.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to open.

ration.description: The percentage to open the device.

number.description: The number to open the device.

groupAction.description: The group action to perform on the devices.
